thread.title: Thomas Campbell
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by Thomas Campbell

author: Thomas Campbell
title: Thomas Campbell
text:
Prestige Flowers website provides plenty of great flowers/bouquets to choose from although I believe some of its features lack detail and clarity!
For example; when selecting either the white or red wines I couldn't find any trace of what this wine was specifically? Dry wine? Fruity wine?.. etc.
Also, I believe that a more detailed list of what you are specifically buying should be provided at the 'checkout' screen.. each individual item?, each items price and a total cost to pay.
Finally, confirmation that the product will be delivered on your desired date should be provided before checkout to prevent any stress which this may cause!
